title: Grey Ooze
description: Slimy horrors that lurk on stone surfaces or among boulders.
extras: Blend in with stone: Difficult to tell apart from wet stone.	Acid: After a successful attack, sticks to the victim and exudes acid. The acid destroys normal armour immediately and inflicts 2d8 damage per round. (Magic armour is dissolved in one turn.)	Energy immunity: Unharmed by cold or fire.
